name: Saunf Aur Kalonji Waale Aloo Shimla Mirch (Potatoes And Bell Peppers Flavored With Fennel And Nigella)
description: Saunf Aur Kalonji Waale Aloo Shimla Mirch (potatoes and bell peppers flavored with fennel and nigella). Vegan and Gluten Free Recipe.
recipeIngredient: 1/4 teaspoon chili flakes ((more or less to taste))

recipeInstructions.text: In a medium pan, heat oil on medium low heat until hot.
recipeInstructions.name: In a medium pan, heat oil on medium low heat until hot.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the asofetida, cumin powder and give it a quick mix.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the asofetida, cumin powder and give it a quick mix.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the fennel seeds and nigella seeds and turmeric and give it a mix.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the fennel seeds and nigella seeds and turmeric and give it a mix.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the garlic and chili flakes and let the garlic turn golden.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the garlic and chili flakes and let the garlic turn golden.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the potatoes, peppers and salt and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the potatoes, peppers and salt and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Cook on low heat covered with occasional stirring for about 15-20 minutes or until the potatoes are cooked.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook on low heat covered with occasional stirring for about 15-20 minutes or until the potatoes are cooked.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve hot garnished with cilantro leaves and a sprinkle of black pepper! Enjoy with Rotis or Naans!
recipeInstructions.name: Serve hot garnished with cilantro leaves and a sprinkle of black pepper! Enjoy with Rotis or Naans!

keywords: potato curry, quick indian recipe, vegan main course
